name: Laravel Bangkok
body:
### Welcome to the Laravel Bangkok Meetup repo.

This repository contains all the relevant links and information related to meetups held by the [Laravel Bangkok Meetup group](http://www.meetup.com/PHP-Laravel-Meetup-Bangkok/).

### September 21st Meetup

The September meetup was sponsored by [Ginja](https://ginja.co.th), your friendly neighbourhood food technology startup, and held at [The Hive](http://thehive.co.th/).

* "Microservices with Lumen" - [Muhammed Imran Hussain](https://twitter.com/MuhammedImranH).
* "12 Factor Laravel Applications" - [Corey Mcmahon](https://twitter.com/corey_mcmahon).
* "Cloudy Logging with Laravel and Rollbar" - [Alex Stansfield](https://twitter.com/sirmuttley).
* "Dangerous PHP" - [Hamish Friedlander](https://twitter.com/hafriedlander).
* "PHP 7.x, 8.0 and Beyond" - [Pierre Joye](https://twitter.com/pierrejoye).

### Authors and Contributors
If you want to update the information here please clone the repository, make your changes on a branch and then open a pull request against `gh-pages`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
